name: es-module-shims
description: Shims for the latest ES module features

scripts.build: rollup ./src/es-module-shims.js -f iife -o dist/es-module-shims.js --banner "/* ES Module Shims 0.2.15 */"
scripts.min: cd dist && terser es-module-shims.js -c passes=2 -m --source-map --comments "/ES Module Shims/" -o es-module-shims.min.js
scripts.build-es5: cd dist && babel --filename es-module-shims.js --out-file es-module-shims.es5.js < es-module-shims.js
scripts.min-es5: cd dist && terser es-module-shims.es5.js -c passes=2 -m --source-map --comments "/ES Module Shims/" -o es-module-shims.es5.min.js
scripts.footprint: npm run build && npm run min && cat dist/es-module-shims.min.js | gzip -9f | wc -c
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run min && npm run build-es5 -s && npm run min-es5 -s

author: Guy Bedford
